participant_1.background:
My biggest fear is that my dogs will run off and get lost.
i like field hockey and soccer.
My family loves food of all types, and we are always looking for new places to try.
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
i only buy convertible cars.

participant_2.background:
I would love to learn how to make my own clothes.
I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
I wake up early and go for a run to clear my head and start the day off right.
My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!

content.text: Hello! I'm looking for someone to chat with. What's up?
Hello! I'm good. I'm just cuddling with my dog on this rainy day.
Nice! I love rainy days. I like to stay in and watch nature documentaries.
Me too! I love watching animals in their natural habitats.
I also love watching the rain fall. It's so relaxing.
It is! I also like the sound of the raindrops on the roof.
That's true! It's a very peaceful sound.
What kind of animals do you like to watch in nature documentaries?
I like watching all kinds of animals, but I especially love watching big cats.
Big cats are awesome! I love watching them hunt and play.
Me too! They're so graceful and powerful.
I agree! They're amazing animals.
I also like watching documentaries about elephants.
Elephants are so intelligent and social. I love watching them interact with each other.
Me too! They're really fascinating animals.
I agree! I could watch nature documentaries all day long.
Me too! I love learning about all the different animals in the world.
Me too! It's so amazing to think about all the different kinds of animals that exist.
It is! I'm glad we agree on that.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who loves animals as much as I do.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
Me too
